member.name: T:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationDirection
member.summary: Contains the values for the NavigationDirection enumeration that determines the sliding direction either vertically or horizontally.

member.summary: Allow user to slide the items horizontally

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationDirection.Vertical
member.summary: Allow user to slide the items vertically.

member.summary: Contains the values for the NavigationStripPosition enumeration that determines the placement of the navigation strip.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationStripPosition.Left
member.summary: Arranges all Tile items at left to the selected view.

member.summary: Arranges all Tile items at top to the selected view.

member.summary: Arranges all Tile items at right to the selected view.

member.summary: Arranges all Tile items at bottom to the selected view.

member.summary: Contains the values for the NavigationStripMode enumeration that determines the representation for items either tile or Dots.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationStripMode.Dots
member.summary: Displays each items as Dot Representation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.NavigationStripMode.Thumbnail
member.summary: Displays each items as Tile Representation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.DotPlacement.None
member.summary: Collapses Dot representation.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.DotPlacement.Default
member.summary: Display Dots representation of items over the selected view

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SfRotator.XForms.DotPlacement.OutSide
member.summary: Display Dots representation of items under the selected view.
